McGillX Research Documentation¶

This is a public repository documenting the tools developed and used by the McGillX research team to package, analyse, and manipulate the data that is collected through McGill’s online courses offered via the edX platform.

Contents:

  • Getting Started
    • Workflow Overview
  • MOOCX
    • Installation
    • Requirements
    • MOOCX Package Contents
  • edX Data Download and Decryption
    • Download the Course Package
    • Downlaod the Tracking Logs
  • Populating Mongo Database
    • McGillX Database Outline
    • Populating A Course Database
  • Extracting csv Datasets
    • 4. Anonymize csv datasets

Open Issues¶

Contact¶

Contact McGillX for questions or assistance with setup:

McGillX - <mcgillx.tls@mcgill.ca>

Contribute¶

If you would like to add new scripts, improve existing scripts, or found an error in the script feel free to send a pull request or raise an issue.
